transcript.text: Hello, hello and welcome to my YouTube channel

...and we lose !

This is clever,  I think I get it , in fact, the echo of yourself reproduces the movements you're doing with a 4 seconds gap
Except that sometimes he wants to replicate what you do but there's a door that'll block him
And when there is a door that blocks him, he resumes the 'loop' from the pasts 5 seconds.
And this is what happened in this last level
When I left the room where there is the door to escape from the level,  he tried to follow me but the yellow door closed in front of him,
Therefore, he relaunched the 'loop' from five seconds before, and he was on the other side of the blue portal five seconds ago. Thus, he oppened the exit door and I could escape.
The fact is that I have not fully understood how the yellow door did close..
... Sh*t, aaah it broke my brain, I can't figure it out.
